divs: Sighting DetailsToday I was reading a news paper from Sept. 16 on a story about Discovery Channel coming to Bucks because of about 45 recent UFO reports. I knew NOTHING about that, but it triggered my memory. On Aug. 11 at about 11pm I went out on my front step to have a cigarette. I was really nervous because my husband had to be in court the next morning trying to get custody of his son. So I was out there praying all would go well. I am a star gazer so I'm usually looking at the sky. All the sudden I see this incredibly bright flash in a circle shape and a bright yellow color which immediately turned into a sort of trail of bright yellow in a triagular shape then disappered. It didn't fade, it just vanished. I looked around to see if any neighbors were out, which there were none. I was like "what the "f" was that?" I never considered it to be a UFO only because it was August and there are meteor showers in August. But I'm a star gazer and have seen countless numbers of showers and "shooting stars", even a comet. I had NEVER seen anything like this. It was so intense. In fact for days after that I kept telling everyone about the crazy shooting star I had seen. I can't say what it was, but reading the article I thought I would report it because to me if was definately something "unidentified."
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Bensalem
There were no other sightings in Bensalem on or around August 11th 2008
Summary: The recent reports in Bucks County, PA
